info.name: Omni Soft - API Collection (ver. 2.0)
info.description:
# **Compatibility**

“Omnicashier” software’s API receive JSON requests on an HTTP socket. By default, port 8989, Ethernet interface is listened.

Configuration

Configure IP addresses on Ethernet network interface of the TPS575 device. API link example 192.168.1.103:8989/v2

### **Launch**

Launch API from the “Omnicashier” software, at login screen press API button.

On Test units default users:

User: SuperApi Password: 123

To obtain API grade user on Production units, please contact technical support via

+994(12)310-1711 or \*1711.

### **Internet connectivity**

TPS575 consumes \~ 1.5 Mb / s of network traffic for correct operation, where ½ is the initial traffic and ½ is the incoming traffic.

Under the condition of continuous intensive work (about 2 checks per minute) for a month, you will need up to 5GB of total traffic.  

### **Compatibility of “Omnicashier” with token version**

Modules "prepayment" and "credit" are available with tokens, that have firmware version higher than 2.18.0

request.description:
Get info about token and last document number "check_type" – 41 get info operation

#### Example Response

``` json
{
    "code": 0,
    "data": {
        "cashbox_factory_number": "002D0035304E50152030384B",
        "cashbox_tax_number": "test_00116",
        "cashregister_factory_number": "all",
        "cashregister_model": "test_all",
        "company_name": "\"OMNITECH\" MƏHDUD MƏSULİYYƏTLİ CƏMİYYƏTİ",
        "company_tax_number": "1504533971",
        "firmware_version": "2.31.0",
        "last_doc_number": 4959,
        "last_online_time": "2024-01-18T13:33:11Z",
        "not_after": "2024-01-26T12:20:04Z",
        "not_before": "2021-01-26T12:19:34Z",
        "object_address": "AZ1065 BAKI ŞƏHƏRİ YASAMAL RAYONU MURTUZA MUXTAROV ev.188 m.33",
        "object_name": "OFİS",
        "object_tax_number": "1504533971-13001",
        "qr_code_url": "https://monitoring.e-kassa.az/#/index?doc=",
        "state": "ACTIVE"
    },
    "message": "Successful operation"
}

 ```

# **Authorization**

"name" – API grade account username  
“password” – API grade account password  
"check_type" – 40 Login operation

#### Example Response

``` json
{
    "access_token": "ooXdkXvLjHlaZSSzgDD8zg==",
    "code": 1,
    "message": "login success"
}

 ```

Shift and unit information

"check_type" – 14 Shift status operation

"access_token" – Session key generated during login opera**tion**

#### Example Response

``` json
{
    "code": 0,
    "desc": "shift is open",
    "message": "Successful operation",
    "serial": "2001G57500300005",
    "shiftStatus": true,
    "shift_open_time": "2024-01-17T21:06:17"
}

 ```

Closing fiscal shift, printing and obtaining Z-Report

"check_type" – 13 Close shift & Z-Report operation

"access_token" – Session key generated during login operation

Open fiscal shift

"check_type" – 15 Open shift operation

"access_token" – Session key generated during login operation

#### Example Response

``` json
{
    "code": 0,
    "message": "Successful operation"
}

 ```

Sale receipt.

#### Example Response

``` json
{
    "code": 0,
    "document_number": 4961,
    "long_id": "Gnu27LbF81Ub4ebtnYD4BnecF5oKD4KFcuNK9EjHvhku",
    "message": "Successful operation",
    "shift_document_number": 2,
    "short_id": "Gnu27LbF81Ub"
}

 ```

Cash deposit receipt

#### Example Response

``` json
{
    "code": 0,
    "document_number": 4960,
    "long_id": "2vjSLjSm7xKjycWMdEVoD5BEmEXhgsyLkUrRwCNb6Agk",
    "message": "Successful operation",
    "shift_document_number": 1,
    "short_id": "2vjSLjSm7xKj"
}

 ```

Reprint half-printed receipt after paper renewal

"check_type" – 16 Reprint after printing error operation

"access_token" – Session key generated during login operation

#### Example Response

``` json
{
    "code": 1,
    "document_number": 4962,
    "long_id": "AYDtoZsSR17S1t7SThCPNPfJEnrqCHQAF91FafUo3E1G",
    "message": "Success",
    "shift_document_number": 3,
    "short_id": "AYDtoZsSR17S"
}

 ```

Receipt of cancellation of sales check in the framework of the current open fiscal shift. Request should contain the “long_id” of sale receipt in "fiscalId" parameter.

#### Example Response

``` json
{
    "code": 0,
    "document_number": 4970,
    "long_id": "FXpzRMrLhRSx8xHf9AhGFhMe4wqYhM1PoXecBrr3gr5G",
    "message": "Successful operation",
    "shift_document_number": 11,
    "short_id": "FXpzRMrLhRSx"
}

 ```

The return receipt of the goods sold in both currently open and already closed fiscal shifts. Request should contain the “long_id” of sale receipt in "parentDocument" parameter. Request should contain the "short_id" of sale document in “refund_short_document_id" parameter.

#### Example Response

``` json
{
    "code": 0,
    "document_number": 4972,
    "long_id": "7gtT1LXnaVvgNrni8rZ9ir4kPbJCon9jWVhf1H5obRq9",
    "message": "Successful operation",
    "shift_document_number": 13,
    "short_id": "7gtT1LXnaVvg"
}

 ```

Cash withdrawal receipt.

#### Example Response

``` json
{
    "code": 0,
    "document_number": 4973,
    "long_id": "AQsobGS8bp5W9UegCGXr2CyMfLVFSNqSTN9b9V9jbZWF",
    "message": "Successful operation",
    "shift_document_number": 14,
    "short_id": "AQsobGS8bp5W"
}

 ```

Correction receipt in case of non-inclusion of information to the fiscal device.

#### Example Response

``` json
{
    "code": 0,
    "document_number": 4974,
    "long_id": "HBV59Ncnf4jV4QWoMiqUHGfXr5N9Jingb4UBtYSiAcUG",
    "message": "Successful operation",
    "shift_document_number": 15,
    "short_id": "HBV59Ncnf4jV"
}

 ```

Printing receipt copy. Request should contain the “long_id” of sale receipt in "fiscalId" parameter.

#### Example Response

``` json
{
    "code": 0,
    "message": "Successful operation"
}

 ```

"access_token" – Session key generated during login operation

Provides the all transactions history for specified period.

"check_type" – 18 Transaction history operation

"access_token" – Session key generated during login operation

#### Example Response

``` json
{
    "code": 0,
    "data": {
        "createdAtUtc": "2024-01-19T13:33:38Z",
        "currencies": [
            {
                "correctionBonusSum": 0.04,
 ```

Credit sale receipt. Request should contain "creditContract" field and only one item for sale.

#### Example Response

``` json
{
    "code": 0,
    "document_number": 451,
    "long_id": "DAqvFzmembJ9TqddedZfTAS6TWUg8CX8FmLePeiea4vr",
    "message": "Successful operation",
    "shift_document_number": 9,
    "short_id": "DAqvFzmembJ9"
}

 ```

Credit pay receipt. Request should contain the **“long_id”** of credit sale receipt in **"parentDocument"** parameter, same **"creditContract"** from credit sale receipt, **“residue”** of the total credit amount and "paymentNumber" of creditpay receipt.

#### Example Response

``` json
{
    "code": 0,
    "document_number": 452,
    "long_id": "DYMgHzBzAzV9jec6L9NmdcuFq5LvszNWbwCW7HtANqhR",
    "message": "Successful operation",
    "shift_document_number": 10,
    "short_id": "DYMgHzBzAzV9"
}

 ```

Credit pay rollback receipt. Receipt of cancellation of credit pays check in the framework of the current open fiscal shift. Request should contain the **“long_id”** of credit pay receipt in **"fiscalId"** parameter. **"check_type"** should be **32**

#### Example Response

``` json
{
    "code": 0,
    "document_number": 453,
    "long_id": "vUaSmfT29aS8DChqRaFvBbTMgLSccmmsYWebSXJpjg6",
    "message": "Successful operation",
    "shift_document_number": 11,
    "short_id": "vUaSmfT29aS8"
}

 ```

CreditSale and Sale with prepay rollback receipt. Receipt of cancellation of creditSale and sale with prepay check in the framework of the current open fiscal shift. Request should contain the **“long_id”** of creditSale or sale with prepay receipt in **"parentDocument"** parameter. **"check_type"** should be 32

#### Example Response

``` json
{
    "code": 0,
    "document_number": 461,
    "long_id": "BuFxc5Z5JryJZ7G5Juz5ydisG4exrD7azGS6WRJz7uuk",
    "message": "Successful operation",
    "shift_document_number": 19,
    "short_id": "BuFxc5Z5JryJ"
}

 ```

The return receipt of the goods sold in both currently open and already closed fiscal shifts. Request should contain the **“long_id”** of credit pay receipt in "parentDocument" parameter. Request should contain the **"short_id"** of credit pay document in **“refund_short_document_id"** parameter. **"check_type"**: should be **100** and **"moneyBackType":7**. **“Items”** contain data from original parent document, but payment fields should be equal to refunded money.

#### Example Response

``` json
{
    "code": 0,
    "document_number": 464,
    "long_id": "BDLPmRT9QvvPQu4iWPMztRrj3ChzEJ4hc4BzsdKAADZy",
    "message": "Successful operation",
    "shift_document_number": 22,
    "short_id": "BDLPmRT9QvvP"
}

 ```

Prepay receipt.

#### Example Response

``` json
{
    "code": 0,
    "document_number": 5011,
    "long_id": "5zpG8Mcf6Y7GgVX5RJ43EQx3fUAnCE1UU8KUxH63BpFY",
    "message": "Successful operation",
    "shift_document_number": 5,
    "short_id": "5zpG8Mcf6Y7G"
}

 ```

For current operation field **“parents”** should contain **"fiscal_id"** of prepay document. **“prepaymentSum”** should be equal or less than amount of prepay document. **“prepaymentSum” <=** prepay document amount. Amount paid with prepay Amount paid as prepay are not taxed and not indicated in the total amount **(“vatSum” & “sum” = “cashSum” + “cashlessSum” + “bonusSum“ ).**

#### Example Response

``` json
{
    "code": 0,
    "document_number": 467,
    "long_id": "EE9gipXxqGZchXEe1ZUsQWSD1f1TryQSTiwPktVKeRVj",
    "message": "Successful operation",
    "shift_document_number": 25,
    "short_id": "EE9gipXxqGZc"
}

 ```

Receipt of cancellation of sales check in the framework of the current open fiscal shift. Request should contain the “long_id” of sale receipt in "fiscalId" parameter.

#### Example Response

``` json
{
    "code": 0,
    "document_number": 469,
    "long_id": "GccWy51rCkMMePQ2DvLv4S8dpencMj177t7M35DFd5MP",
    "message": "Successful operation",
    "shift_document_number": 27,
    "short_id": "GccWy51rCkMM"
}

 ```

The return receipt of the goods sold in both currently open and already closed fiscal shifts. Request should contain the “long_id” of sale receipt in "parentDocument" parameter. Request should contain the "short_id" of sale document in “refund_short_document_id" parameter.

#### Example Response

``` json
{
    "code": 0,
    "document_number": 5012,
    "long_id": "HyxMcPiq439g7FQkDPjEw8rYbArHHdnuTVN83QqPh8tk",
    "message": "Successful operation",
    "shift_document_number": 6,
    "short_id": "HyxMcPiq439g"
}

 ```

MoneyBack of prepay residue receipt. Request should contain the “long_id” of prepay receipt in "parents" parameter, "moneyBackType" should be equal to 6. Items fields should be same with prepay receipt, but “sum” and “vatSum” equal to refunded amount.

#### Example Response

``` json
{
    "code": 0,
    "document_number": 5014,
    "long_id": "4PPTmvKPNvhdCaPCbihSHP8UXZtpjKRfgxVZB9fxHhFr",
    "message": "Successful operation",
    "shift_document_number": 8,
    "short_id": "4PPTmvKPNvhd"
}

 ```

Prepay amount could be different, than total price of items

``` json
    "message": "Successful operation",
    "shift_document_number": 9,
    "short_id": "2GshVki4AMRF"
}

 ```

An income tax has been introduced for some categories of products, which requires a separation of the marginal part and cost, where the marginal part is taxed in accordance with the percentage of taxation, part of the cost is not taxed. Due to this reason, in the refund request as well, the amounts subject to Value Added Tax (VAT) and the amounts without VAT should be indicated separately as follows:

#### Example Response

``` json
{
    "code": 0,
    "document_number": 5018,
    "long_id": "9k1K3xdzvvPsyMhKCHQiGZzBEGMFW3Ew36Bz3Vc7vXz7",
    "message": "Successful operation",
    "shift_document_number": 12,
    "short_id": "9k1K3xdzvvPs"
}

 ```
